name: Streichholz
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 144, Theme: In the Dark

Can you trust what you see in light?

Streichholz is a platformer, where the world is different when you turn the lights off.

You play as a single match, the goal is to light a torch at the end of a level.

Controls:

A, D - Move
W - Jump
Space - Switch lights

Installation

Unpack zip file and run Streichholz.exe
